extendedInfo.description: VRec Light is a free digital sound recorder, which allows you to record any sound that is in close proximity of your smartphone. All record files will be stored at on phone's SD card as a default storage.After the installation if no specific audio format has been chosen, the application will use 3gp format by default .Lite version supports all features as PRO version beside unlimited record time. Lite version allows you only 2 minutes of recording time for each single recording. If you need more, please consider to purchase a PRO version.Features:=========- FREE OF ADS !- Require android 2.2 and higher- Ability to record in various file formats.  (Now supporting 3 - continuously growing)- No limitation on record files amount.- Store files on SD.- Ability to Play,Record,Rename and Delete file.Works great on :================- HTC Desire- Samsung galaxy i9000- Samsung Galaxy S2It is important to us to deliver to you quality product, thats why we care about product rating! Please report us any bug you found and we will fix it in a new versions !To Rename or Delete recorded files - press long press on file you want to delete/rename and appropriate dialog will appear.

reviews.title: Not what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: The recording length is very short and if your phone goes to battery save mode the app stops recording. Not helpful at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice. works great on droid x. But it needs to have a pause button. Also, no directions on how to delete files from app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: i have a 3gp. This is the worst recorder ever after recording 2 recordings it said illegal file meaning i didnt have the 3gp on and i did. It dont wor

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.comment: Nice and simple app. Worked  fine for me. No ads!

reviews.title: I don\'t know if this works or not
reviews.comment: The sound players and editors I have recognize the file formats, but apparently this app is using a codec that I don\'t have. Where do I get codecs to play/edit the recorded files?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works like a charm! Great for hunting ghosts!

reviews.comment: Best recorder on market! 3pg and amr works just fine! Please consider to add wav format. I defenetly recomend this recorder!
